answer: To reset your password, open the corporate portal, click 'Forgot Password', and follow the OTP steps. If MFA is enabled, use your authenticator app.
If Wi‑Fi isn't working: 1) Toggle Airplane mode off, 2) Forget and rejoin 'CorpNet' using your AD credentials, 3) If still failing, try wired LAN or raise a ticket.
For email issues: 1) Check Outlook Service Status, 2) Clear cache, 3) Re-add your account. For password prompts, lock/unlock your device and ensure VPN is connected.
